ModMetaData.name: Wolfs GauMedicine
ModMetaData.author: Wolf478
ModMetaData.description: This is a simple expansion mod for Vanilla Ideology Expanded: Dryads, that improves upon your ability to produce Medicine. Dryads producing an endless supply of Herbal Medicine, but not able to obtain Neutroamine? Not a worry! Introducing GauMedicine; Much better than Herbal Medicine, produced from the fruit of your other dryads.
